Sentencas: A generic system-level model for SOFC cogeneration devices has been developed under the umbrella of an International Energy Agency/Energy Conservation in Buildings and Community Systems project known as Annex 42.
Titulo: Improved modelling of the fuel cell power module within a system-level model for solid-oxide fuel cell cogeneration systems

Sentencas: This paper addresses a limitation of the Annex 42 model by developing a more refined semi-mechanistic treatment for the fuel cell power module (FCPM).
Titulo: Improved modelling of the fuel cell power module within a system-level model for solid-oxide fuel cell cogeneration systems

Sentencas: The electrochemical thermal, and reformation modelling methods as well as techniques for treating the FCPM's balance of plant are first described.
Titulo: Improved modelling of the fuel cell power module within a system-level model for solid-oxide fuel cell cogeneration systems

Sentencas: The methods used to calibrate and validate the enhanced model using previously collected data from a 2.8 kW(AC) prototype SOFC cogeneration device are then discussed.
Titulo: Improved modelling of the fuel cell power module within a system-level model for solid-oxide fuel cell cogeneration systems

Sentencas: Excellent agreement was found between model predictions and the measurements.
Titulo: Improved modelling of the fuel cell power module within a system-level model for solid-oxide fuel cell cogeneration systems

Sentencas: The new modelling capabilities are then demonstrated through a parametric study that examines the influences of fuel utilization, excess air ratio and stack temperature.
Titulo: Improved modelling of the fuel cell power module within a system-level model for solid-oxide fuel cell cogeneration systems
Improved modelling of the fuel cell power module within a system-level model for solid-oxide fuel cell cogeneration systems
